title: Lead Me, Guide Me

lyrics.text:
I am weak, and I need Thy strength and power To help me over my weakest hour;
Let me through the darkness Thy face to see, Lead me, O Lord, lead me.

Help me tread in the paths of righteousness; Be my aid when Satan and sin oppress.
I am putting all my trust in Thee, Lead me, O Lord, lead me.

author: Doris Akers
